channel.title: GitHub Nix Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Nix in GitHub

item.title: 0xc000022070/zen-browser-flake
item.description: Community-driven Nix Flake for the Zen browser

item.title: dustinlyons/nixos-config
item.description: General purpose Nix starter template for macOS or NixOS w/ step-by-step instructions

item.title: Misterio77/nix-starter-configs
item.description: Simple and documented config templates to help you get started with NixOS + home-manager + flakes. All the boilerplate you need!

item.title: ryantm/agenix
item.description: age-encrypted secrets for NixOS and Home manager

item.title: nix-community/disko
item.description: Declarative disk partitioning and formatting using nix [maintainers=@Lassulus @Enzime @iFreilicht @Mic92 @phaer]

item.title: NixOS/nixos-hardware
item.description: A collection of NixOS modules covering hardware quirks.

item.title: nix-community/stylix
item.description: Theming framework for NixOS, Home Manager, nix-darwin, and Nix-on-Droid [maintainers=@awwpotato, @danth, @trueNAHO]

item.title: nix-community/nixos-apple-silicon
item.description: Resources to install NixOS bare metal on Apple Silicon Macs [maintainers=@tpwrules,@flokli,@yuyuyureka]

item.title: the-nix-way/dev-templates
item.description: Dev environments for numerous languages based on Nix flakes [maintainer=@lucperkins]
